forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 5 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West wind 8 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the early dawn reveals an enchanting palette of blue skies and gentle sunlight, promising a day steeped in clarity. The forecast indicates a warm embrace with temperatures that will hover around 70, gradually easing into a mellow 67 as the afternoon unfolds. A light caress of west-northwest winds dances through the air, which might serve to remind you of the city’s coastal essence while bringing refreshing bursts of movement, hinted at by gusts nearing 29 mph.

The atmosphere appears satisfyingly serene this morning, with little sign of the typical fog that blankets the bay; instead, a light haze hints at far-off horizons, creating an unobscured view of the Golden Gate Bridge and the bustling skyline. As daylight appreciates its full breadth, this is an ideal moment to don a light jacket or a comfortable sweater—perfect for watching the city awaken, perhaps with a warm cup of coffee in hand as you stroll along the Embarcadero. Such conditions invite leisurely exploration, whether it’s meandering through the lush expanse of Golden Gate Park or discovering the hidden gem cafés tucked away in the Mission District. As the sun sets later, the clear skies will transition to a gentle coolness, making for a cozy evening under the stars.
